Call Back Service FAQs

What is a call back service?

When customers contact a call center, live agents are not always available. Or, in some cases, calls must be transferred to different departments. Instead of making the customer sit on the phone listening to hold music, call back services allow for them to hang up until an available agent rings them back.

What is a reminder call service?

Ahead of an appointment or booking, a reminder call service will contact your customer to double-check that they are on track to attend. This helps reduce no-shows and missed appointments.

What type of businesses benefit from reminder calls?

From healthcare to real estate, any industry which requires in-person meetings and appointments can benefit from a phone call reminder call service.
